credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles B. Alexander
title: Project for a sedan chair
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gray water color on paper
description: Shown in profile turned toward right, without ornamentation.  The panel beside the window is subdivided by a curved stripe rising similar to the scroll in 1900-1-11.  Similar stripes frame the panels.  Erased from the left base line, probably: "W H Sq....." and a word in the foot.
name: Drawing
